B2B GDPR ready file transfers

Deliver your data speedily, reliably and safely

Point to point delivery with encryption guarantees reliable, safe and fast delivery

Find out more

SnippetBox will queue your datafiles, send using your required protocol and verify its delivery

We use one simple API which can serve transfers in all common file transfer protocols.

You can switch protocol at any time.

Encryption

Your files are saved into an encrypted location before they are sent. Only the recipient can decrypt them.

Reliability

We make sure your files are delivered and notify you and your business partner about successful transfers.

GDPR Ready

We do not store any unnecessary data. And as soon as your file is delivered it is removed from our system.

Global distribution

Thanks to our global infrastructure we do not depend on local datacenter reliability.

... reliable like a freight train
